vsParam: We're here! Wow. I feel so calm and peaceful!

とうちゃーく！！
んー、気分が落ち着くなぁぁぁぁ！
Is it just me? You don't look calm at all.
Ha ha ha. This is how I normally look. Don't mind it.
So... Listen to me, everyone! Here you are!
Yes! I made it with the same ingredient of the bowknot on my hat.

そう！　
あたしの帽子のリボンと同じヤツを使って作ったの！
Heehee. I've made improvements on my alchemical skills.
Consider the bookmark as a small gift. Thank you all for helping me.

そのしおりはね。
みんなへの感謝の気持ちなんだ！

Yes. I accidentally came to this world.
You guys took me to many places.

And I went through many joyful things.
Every single day I spend here is fulfilling.

楽しいこともたくさん経験させてもらった。
ふふ、かなーり充実してる毎日を送ってるからさ

So... in return, here!
If you don't mind, come get your gift!
Yeah! Of course, Ryza! But we should be thanking you.
Yeah. Our lives have become way more interesting since you arrived.
That's right! Hehe. We're so happy to be your friends, Ryza.

みんな……！
ありがとうっ！
Next, let's continue our glorious adventures! Heehee.

へへっ。
これからも……一緒に輝かしい冒険をしちゃおうね！
Alright. You already have got your gifts. Let's go back.

よーし、そろそろ帰ろうか！
渡したいものは渡せたし！

Yeah. Let's go back to the Academy.
We shall race to see who gets back first!

Ah. No! Peppermint, you got wings.
I don't want to compete with you... Ah.

あっ、ちょっと！
ペパーミントは飛べるから卑怯……うげっ！
Hey, are you alright? You fell down hard... Ah.
Boo-hoo. Ah! My boot ripped again!
... Hmm. Ryza, the size of your boots...
They are of the right size! The right size! Gee!

合ってる！　合ってるよ！
もーっ！
